prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon that looks like a poodle with vibrant colors and accessories.
Show me a cute and stylish Pokemon that has a poodle-like appearance and heart motifs.
Imagine a fashionable Pokemon with a fluffy coat, pink accents, and a charming personality.
Design a playful Pokemon that resembles a fancy dog with unique grooming styles and colors.
Generate an elegant Pokemon that has a fluffy appearance and loves to show off its style.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies luxury with its fluffy fur and stylish, colorful features.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that looks like a pampered pet with a fluffy coat and cute details.
